ygData.subject: Just great and reminders
ygData.msgSnippet: As much as I didn t want to do a follow-up to my own set of scenarios, suddennly I found myself with almost half the material for another set of 50 scenarios.

As much as I didn't want to do a follow-up to my own set of scenarios, 
suddennly I found myself with almost half the material for another set 
of 50 scenarios. [I even found the way to put every month's entry I 
make into the new set.]  Joy.  Joy.

Also, a reminder: by the end of the Sunday, I need to know who all 
plans on participating in the 1st Monthly Scenario Contest.

Speaking of which, the week before the entries for the monthly 
scenario contest are due (June 1 - June 6), we're taking submissions 
for themes for the 2nd monthly scenario contest.  On June 7 the 
contest entries are due.  From June 15 through June 20, we'll vote on 
the best entry.  Is one week going to be enough time for people to 
look over the entries?
